explains: v. 毒害（poison 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: lead poisoning n. 铅中毒；[美国俚语]中弹受伤
carbon monoxide poisoning 一氧化碳中毒
blood poisoning n. 败血症；血中毒

sentences.en: Someone had been poisoning his food.
sentences.cn: 有人一直在他的食物里下毒。

sentences.en: The rats were controlled by poisoning.
sentences.cn: 用毒杀法使老鼠受到控制。

sentences.en: He was suffering from salmonella poisoning.
sentences.cn: 他当时正忍受着沙门氏菌中毒的折磨。
